name: Tidewater Inc.
description: Tidewater Inc. is a leading provider of offshore service vessels and marine support services to the global energy industry. Established in 1956, Tidewater has built a vast fleet of high-performance vessels that support exploration and production activities for oil and gas companies around the world. The company operates in key regions including the Gulf of Mexico, North Sea, West Africa, and Latin America, providing services such as platform supply, anchor handling, and crew transportation. Tidewater is recognized for its commitment to safety and operational excellence, with a focus on modernizing its fleet to meet the evolving demands of the offshore market. The company also emphasizes sustainability, implementing practices that minimize environmental impact while maximizing efficiency. With decades of experience and a strong reputation in the industry, Tidewater continues to adapt to market changes and technological advancements, positioning itself as a vital partner in the offshore energy sector.

seo.meta_title: Tidewater Inc. | Offshore Marine Services for the Energy Sector
seo.meta_description: Explore Tidewater Inc., a leader in offshore marine services providing vessel support to the global energy industry. Discover our commitment to safety, sustainability, and operational excellence.

faq.question: What services does Tidewater provide?
faq.answer: Tidewater provides offshore support services, including platform supply, crew transportation, and anchor handling.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Tidewater?
faq.answer: Quintin Kneen is the CEO of Tidewater Inc.

faq.question: Where is Tidewater headquartered?
faq.answer: Tidewater is headquartered in New Orleans, Louisiana, USA.
